infos.value: You’ve grown stronger, Mont.
Because I have more to protect now.
...I see.
You have no intention of coming back, do you?
Enough. My mind remains unchanged.
The only way before me is painted in blood. That is my destiny.
Sterne...
Though I killed that man with my own hands...
Just the thought of him fuels my rage.
I burn with the desire to destroy everything he ever built.
This country...this castle...and...
You, Mont! My own self, even!
Has that golden armor driven you to this?
No, that’s not it.
Even without this armor, we would have ended up here.
And so...
I’m prepared to do what I must.
You’re not the only one prepared to do so.
This doesn’t sit well with me. But I'll do it for the woman I love.
We shall assist you.
